textBox.richText: Fundamentals in Statistical Pattern Recognition The first 2 labs of the course (EE-612) on statistical pattern recognition are available ! Lab 1 is on Linear Regression and Polynomial Regression (using Gradient Descent) with hands-on in Python. Lab 2 is on (Linear and Polynomial) Logistic Regression (using Gradient Descent and L-BFGS minimization) with hands-on in Python and BOB. A special mention to André Anjos for the labs in Python ! The main page for the course overview, content and material is HERE.
Labs 1+2 at EPFL on Statistical Pattern Recognition
